text.section: Each person operating a bicycle or a motor scooter on a roadway may ride two abreast only if the flow of traffic is unimpeded.
Each person operating a bicycle or a motor scooter on a roadway shall exercise due care when passing a vehicle.
Each person operating a bicycle or a motor scooter on a roadway may walk the bicycle or motor scooter on the right side of a highway if there is no sidewalk.
